professional_summary: IT Consultant with over nine years of experience in database management and IT solutions. Expertise in SQL Server, Oracle, and other database systems. Proven skills in data migration, backup/restoration, performance tuning, and process optimization.

key_responsibilities: Collaborated with technical teams to document database requirements and implement solutions.
Installed and maintained SQL Server and Oracle databases across multiple environments.
Monitored database services and ensured high availability through regular maintenance and optimization.
Conducted data migration activities for large-scale systems.
Performed backup and restoration operations on remote servers.
Ensured data integrity during migration processes.
Developed and maintained SQL Server databases for multiple applications.
Monitored database performance and resolved issues related to disk space
query optimization
and backup processes.
Collaborated with application development teams to resolve production issues.
Planned and implemented new tablespaces to support business requirements.
Optimized database performance by tuning queries and indexes.
Performed regular backups and recovery operations using Oracle tools.
Sold and distributed IT products and solutions to clients.
Provided personalized service to meet client-specific needs.
Managed inventory and ensured compliance with company standards.

work_experience.company: Pioneer Diagnostic Center & Boston Consulting Group
key_responsibilities: Generated daily reports for network and database operations.
Installed and configured Oracle databases to support business applications.
Established backup and disaster recovery procedures.
